channel.title: How to draw interfaces
channel.description: How do people draw interfaces like what program?

item.title: How to draw interfaces
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:6, topic:546858”][quote author=hadlich4 link=topic=665756.msg4450761#msg4450761 date=1411166935]

Interfaces for what? You can use anything. Photoshop would work fine for everything though!

Like buttons and client backgrounds

Photoshop would be the best for that!

How much is it?
[/quote]
Free if you use the modified amtlib.dll - otherwise check this link http://www.adobe.com/uk/products/photoshop.html[/quote]
You can also modify the hosts file on windows to stop the adobe activator from being able to check if it’s legit or not.
There’s also a 30 day free trial if you wanna go legit.

Read full topic
